name: Detective Thaw
description:
Team: DevEnabled

Created By: Rob Brooks

Detect your way through a series of rooms to find if there is indeed something strange hiding in this house.

Controls: 

WASD/Arrows - Move

E - Interact

Left mouse click - Interact with menus

Esc - Pause / Quit

Premade Assets:
Gunshot: http://soundbible.com/1906-Barreta-M9.html

Fonts: https://www.dafontfree.io/download/noir/

Music: Noir Jazz - Royalty free collection
